data.text: @GillianLazarus Frightening fact that Godding can use the most blatant antisemitism as a handy way of rallying the Corbyn troops as they dither over supporting the Russian maniac. Putin demands they leave reality far behind.
@GillianLazarus I think Paul is partying like it's 1917- he wishes.
@GillianLazarus The original post is bonkers enough
